name: There's An Asteroid Coming! demo
description:
READ FIRST!

Hello all! I'm very excited to be sharing my first major project with you all.  This is There's An Asteroid Coming!

An asteroid will hit Earth in twenty-four hours, and life as we know it will cease to exist.  With only one day left in your entire life, how do you choose to spend it?  What is worth spending it on?

This title is in active development, and no single path has been fully completed yet.  If you get to a location and nothing appears to be happening, you have likely reached the end of the playable route there.  Exit out and try again.  (But if you're in a field with a car, there's more you can do there.)

Have fun!
